track.name: Locomotion
comments: He will remain forever in the memory of jazz musicians and jazz fans.
Legend!!!
John Coltrane (tenor sax)Lee Morgan (trumpet)Curtis Fuller (trombone)Kenny Drew (piano)Paul Chambers (double bass)Philly Joe Jones (drums). Thanks to Im2jazzy4U) for credits.I used to have this LP.
Best song ever!!! XD

trane rules.
